common.aboutp1: üë®‚Äçüíª With many years' experience in web development, I specialize in Back-End, business applications and custom software development.
common.aboutp2: ‚úÖ Whether you need to develop a complex web application, set up an efficient management system or improve the performance of your existing site, I'm here to support you every step of the way, from design to delivery, deployment and maintenance.
common.aboutp3: üí¨ Contact me now to discuss your project and let's start working together to achieve your goals!
common.about_rich:
Hello,

üë®‚Äçüíª With several years of experience in web development, I have worked with large corporations and startups in various sectors such as retail, innovation, and cybersecurity. I specialize in back-end, management applications, and custom software development.

‚úÖ Whether you need to develop a complex web application, set up a high-performance management system, or improve your existing site's performance, I am here to support you at every stage of the process, from design to delivery, including deployment and maintenance.
üíª Web development: I develop new features, maintain and evolve existing systems, and fix bugs. With my expertise in ASP.NET, PHP, and the Symfony, CakePHP, and Zend frameworks, I offer tailor-made solutions adapted to your needs.
üîå API integration: I can integrate third-party applications to enrich your web solutions or create your own API to interconnect your applications, thus improving the efficiency and productivity of your systems.
üîß Refactoring: I restructure and optimize existing code to facilitate maintenance and evolution, while improving readability and application performance.
üé® UI redesign: I design modern, responsive user interfaces, providing an optimal user experience on all screen sizes.
üåê Web server management: I set up and configure high-performance, secure web server infrastructures, or help you change your domain name.
üí¨ Contact me now to discuss your project and let's work together to achieve your goals!

apigem.description: Redesign Apigem's web application with a modern UI/UX and responsive design to enhance user experience and accessibility.

introduction.description: As a key developer on the Apigem project, I led the modernization of their web application used by medical clinics for patient and staff management. The project involved transforming a legacy system into a modern, responsive web application while maintaining seamless integration with their existing desktop solution.
introduction.introduction: Apigem Web serves as a critical tool for medical staff, enabling them to manage patient records, staff schedules, and appointments. My role focused on improving the application's usability and accessibility while ensuring robust integration with their existing systems.
introduction.name: Apigem Web
introduction.title: Apigem

group.intro: To lead the transformation of the legacy system into a modern, maintainable architecture with improved performance and scalability.

1.title: Architecture Analysis and Planning
description: Conduct a comprehensive analysis of the existing legacy system architecture
Identify performance bottlenecks in database queries and API calls
Plan the implementation of a modern MVC architecture with REST API endpoints
Design a new database structure optimized for web application performance

2.title: Core System Implementation
description: Implement a modular architecture using PHP namespaces and autoloading
Develop a REST API layer for seamless integration with the desktop application
Create an efficient caching system for frequently accessed data
Implement secure authentication and session management

group.intro: Transformed the user interface into a modern, responsive design with improved usability and accessibility.

1.title: Responsive Design Implementation
description: Implement Bootstrap 4 grid system for responsive layouts across all devices
Create custom CSS components for consistent styling and branding
Develop mobile-first design patterns for optimal user experience
Implement touch-friendly controls for tablet and mobile users

2.title: Interactive Features Development
description: Develop real-time updates using AJAX and WebSocket technology
Implement drag-and-drop functionality for appointment scheduling
Create dynamic form validation with instant feedback
Add keyboard shortcuts for power users

group.intro: Significantly improved application performance through various optimization techniques.

1.title: Database Optimization
description: Optimize database queries reducing response time by 60%
Implement query caching for frequently accessed data
Create efficient indexing strategies for large datasets
Develop a data archiving system for historical records

2.title: Frontend Performance
description: Implement lazy loading for images and content
Optimize JavaScript bundle size using code splitting
Create efficient DOM manipulation patterns
Implement browser caching strategies

bubo.description: Modernize a legacy PHP application to Symfony 4, implement Material Design principles, and add advanced data visualization with ApexCharts.

introduction.description: Led the complete modernization of a legacy PHP application, focusing on system architecture, user interface, and data visualization improvements
introduction.introduction: Modernized a legacy PHP application to meet current web standards and improve user experience
introduction.name: BUBO Cybsersec
introduction.title: BUBO

group.intro: To lead the migration from a legacy PHP application to Symfony 4, focusing on performance optimization and architectural improvements.

1.title: Legacy to Symfony Migration
description: Conduct comprehensive analysis of performance bottlenecks and architectural limitations
Design new database structure and Doctrine entities for optimal integration
Refactor PHP and JavaScript code for improved maintainability
Implement modern development practices and coding standards

2.title: UI/UX Redesign
description: Lead UI/UX redesign adopting Material Design principles
Select and integrate UIkit via Yarn, customizing it for application needs
Utilize Webpack Encore for asset management and optimization
Design consistent design system including horizontal navigation, custom components, and responsive dashboards

group.intro: To replace legacy charting system with ApexCharts for modern and interactive data visualization.

1.title: Interactive Charts Implementation
description: Implement charts with zoom functionality and export capabilities
Add real-time updates and dynamic filtering features
Create responsive and interactive data visualizations
Optimize chart performance for large datasets

group.intro: To integrate OpenVas for advanced vulnerability monitoring and implement real-time security metrics.

1.title: Vulnerability Management
description: Develop real-time vulnerability data processing and analysis system
Design robust database for historical vulnerability tracking
Create interactive dashboards with real-time security metrics
Implement automated vulnerability assessment workflows

group.intro: To implement dynamic data loading and AJAX updates for optimal performance.

1.title: Data Loading Optimization
description: Implement dynamic data loading using KnpPaginator
Create efficient sorting and filtering mechanisms for large datasets
Optimize AJAX updates for real-time data refresh
Improve overall application response time and user experience

hml.description: Optimize and modernize Mediabase, a key export and data processing platform for book distributors, focusing on automation, reliability, and performance.

introduction.name: Harmonia Mundi Livre
introduction.introduction: As the lead developer for Mediabase, I was responsible for two major system improvements: optimizing the existing template-based export system and developing a new customized export system. The project aimed to enhance data processing efficiency and provide more flexible export capabilities for users.
introduction.description: I led both the optimization of the existing template system and the development of a new customized export system, focusing on performance improvements, user experience, and advanced export features.

group.intro: To optimize the existing template-based export system to significantly improve performance and reliability, focusing on the PDF generation process using FPDF.

performance.title: Performance Analysis and Optimization
description: Conduct a thorough analysis of the existing template system's performance bottlenecks, particularly in the FPDF-based generation process
Identify and resolve memory management issues in PDF generation, where each element is generated pixel-by-pixel
Implement efficient data processing algorithms to handle large batches of PDF generation
Reduce PDF generation time from one day to approximately 20 minutes by implementing template-based generation

template.title: Template System Implementation
description: Develop a robust template engine using pre-filled files with static covers and shapes (Template F and Template G)
Create a flexible template management system that copies and modifies templates instead of generating from scratch
Implement caching mechanisms for improved performance and reduced memory usage
Add support for various export formats and layouts, with automated notification system for completed exports

group.intro: To develop a new customized export system with advanced features and flexible configuration options, including dynamic field management and format selection.

fields.title: Dynamic Field Management
description: Implement a dynamic field selection system with category-based organization and permission checks
Create a user-friendly interface for field configuration with drag-and-drop functionality
Add support for custom field formatting and validation, including number, text, and list types
Develop field dependency management system with automatic category hiding based on permissions

rights.title: Advanced Rights Management
description: Design and implement a granular permissions system for field access control
Create role-based access control for export features with field-level permissions
Develop export quota management system with usage tracking
Implement audit logging for export operations with detailed user activity tracking

formats.title: Format Selection and Customization
description: Develop support for multiple export formats (PDF, Excel, CSV) with format-specific optimizations
Create format-specific configuration options with custom formatting rules
Implement format validation and preview features with real-time updates
Add support for custom format templates with save and share capabilities

group.intro: To modernize the production environment to support both export systems efficiently, including migration to Ubuntu 22.04 and implementation of secure configurations.

infrastructure.title: System Analysis and Infrastructure Setup
description: Analyze current infrastructure using Zend Framework, Docker for search library, and Samba for file sharing
Set up a modern production environment with Ubuntu 22.04 and optimized Apache configuration
Implement secure configurations and access controls for application and file sharing
Create automated deployment and backup systems with comprehensive testing procedures

migration.title: System Migration and Integration
description: Plan and execute smooth migration of both export systems with zero downtime
Ensure data integrity during migration process with automated validation
Implement monitoring and alerting systems for both export processes
Create comprehensive documentation for both systems including setup and maintenance procedures

hopps.description: Develop and maintain AlertCenter, a comprehensive IT infrastructure monitoring platform providing real-time insights and incident management capabilities.

introduction.description: As a developer at Hopps Groupe, I worked on maintaining and enhancing their internal monitoring tools, particularly AlertCenter, which serves as a central platform for IT infrastructure monitoring and incident management.
introduction.introduction: AlertCenter is a critical tool used by the infrastructure department to monitor and manage IT systems. The platform integrates with various monitoring tools and provides real-time dashboards for incident tracking and escalation.
introduction.name: AlertCenter
introduction.title: Hopps Group

group.intro: To enhance AlertCenter's capabilities as a central monitoring platform for IT infrastructure and incident management, focusing on real-time monitoring and efficient incident handling.

1.title: Monitoring Dashboard Development
description: Develop a centralized dashboard aggregating data from multiple infrastructure monitoring tools
Implement real-time incident display with team-specific indicators and severity levels
Create a comprehensive incident history and log viewing system with advanced filtering
Add real-time metrics visualization with customizable time ranges

2.title: System Modernization
description: Modernize the codebase using object-oriented programming and MVC architecture
Implement WebSocket technology for real-time data updates without polling
Enhance webservice integrations for seamless data synchronization
Develop an advanced incident escalation system with SMS and call notifications based on criticality

group.intro: To successfully separate AlertCenter into two independent applications to support a client's separation from the main group, ensuring data isolation and maintaining functionality.

1.title: Multi-tenant Implementation
description: Design and implement a multi-tenant architecture for separate client environments
Develop request filtering system to maintain tool connectivity based on user accounts
Create a more efficient solution to handle client separation requirements
Implement data isolation mechanisms to ensure client data privacy

2.title: Access Control System
description: Implemented account grouping with conditional filtering throughout the application
Developed cross-server request filtering to maintain tool connectivity
Created role-based access control with granular permissions
Conducted comprehensive unit testing before client deployment

group.intro: To create an efficient service center ticketing interface that bridges multiple systems and automates user management, significantly reducing manual intervention.

1.title: Service Desk Integration
description: Develop a web-based form for CDS to create Jira tickets efficiently
Implement LDAP integration to pre-fill ticket information using personnel numbers
Create a seamless workflow for ticket creation and management
Add automated ticket categorization based on incident type

2.title: Identity Management
description: Build a bridge between two Active Directories and the Jira ticketing system
Implement automatic Jira account creation for new users via Jira API
Develop a synchronization system for user roles and permissions
Create automated user provisioning and deprovisioning workflows

scf.description: Develop a comprehensive web platform for the French-speaking SC community, providing localized content, real-time updates, and community features as an alternative to the English official website.

introduction.description: The game related to the site is under development, and all content is currently in English. We propose an alternative for the French-speaking community
introduction.introduction: Personal project to become an additional support for a community of 6000 users on a chat application (Discord)!
introduction.name: SC Francophone Web
introduction.title: SC Francophone

group.intro: To build a modern web platform using React and Node.js, focusing on performance, scalability, and real-time features for the French-speaking community.

1.title: Core Architecture Implementation
description: Develop a React frontend with server-side rendering for optimal performance
Implement a Node.js backend with RESTful API endpoints
Create an optimized MongoDB database structure for content management
Set up Docker containers for consistent development and deployment

2.title: Real-time Features
description: Implement WebSocket integration for real-time updates and notifications
Create a live chat system with Discord integration
Develop real-time content synchronization across multiple servers
Add push notifications for important community updates

group.intro: Developed an efficient content management system for handling game-related information and community content.

1.title: Data Integration
description: Create automated data scraping system for game updates and news
Implement content translation pipeline for French localization
Develop caching system using Redis for improved performance
Build content validation and moderation tools

2.title: Community Features
description: Develop user profile system with Discord integration
Create community forums with real-time updates
Implement content sharing and voting system
Add moderation tools for community management

group.intro: Implemented various optimization techniques to ensure fast loading times and smooth user experience.

1.title: Frontend Optimization
description: Implement code splitting and lazy loading for faster initial load
Optimize image loading with WebP format and responsive images
Create efficient state management with Redux
Add service worker for offline functionality

2.title: Backend Optimization
description: Implement database indexing for faster queries
Create efficient caching strategies with Redis
Develop load balancing for multiple servers
Add monitoring and logging for performance tracking

freelance.description: Work as a freelance developer for various clients, handling web development, consulting, and custom solutions.

introduction.name: Freelance
introduction.introduction: As a freelance developer, I have worked on a variety of projects for clients in different industries, providing web development, consulting, and technical support.
introduction.description: Presentation of some recent freelance projects.

group.intro: Modernize an existing business application by migrating from legacy PHP code to Symfony 4, with UI/UX redesign and advanced data visualization integration.

1.title: Technical migration and UI/UX redesign
description: Analyze the existing architecture and identify weak points
Migrate the legacy PHP backend to Symfony 4 for better maintainability
Redesign the user interface with Material Design principles
Integrate interactive data visualizations (ApexCharts)
Optimize application performance and security

group.intro: Develop a Bootstrap showcase site to present innovative headphones for fighter pilots, aimed at investors.

1.title: Showcase site development
description: Design a modern, responsive interface with Bootstrap
Highlight the technical features of Edge Sound headphones
Create product presentation and investor information pages
Optimize the site's SEO
